overview:
## Discussion

An array of contact property keys or key descriptors from contact objects to be fetched in the returned contacts. For example, [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactEmailAddressesKey], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactPhoneNumbersKey], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactFormatterStyle/fullName] fetches the contact’s email addresses, phone numbers, and contact’s full name with the contact formatter.

# keysToFetch

**Instance Property**

The properties to fetch in the returned contacts.

## Declaration

```swift
var keysToFetch: [any CNKeyDescriptor] { get set }
```

## Discussion

An array of contact property keys or key descriptors from contact objects to be fetched in the returned contacts. For example, [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactEmailAddressesKey], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactPhoneNumbersKey], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactFormatterStyle/fullName] fetches the contact’s email addresses, phone numbers, and contact’s full name with the contact formatter.
title: keysToFetch
